manifest.name: SkinVista.Integrated
manifest.author: SkinVista
manifest.description: Windows Vista Theme, with Default System Frames

menu.text: Check Menu: Window: Show Nav Bar
Then Float Nav Bar and Menu Bar Parts-
Reload GUI to Clear Defects: Cntrl+Shift+Z
Check Menu: Window: Show Nav Bar
Then Float Nav Bar and Menu Bar Parts-
Reload GUI to Clear Defects: Cntrl+Shift+Z
Gracefully Supports English Tabbed Mode Only
